title: Man out at Bob Evans factory over Confederate flag
text:
Published By: Detroit Free Press - Today 
A Bob Evans employee in Michigan is out of work after he declined to remove a large Confederate flag from his pickup truck in the parking lo... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
